snippet: The foreign minister, Prince Saud al-Faisal, accused Tehran of meddling, as a feud between two regional powers intensified.
abstract: Saudi Arabian Foreign Min Prince Saud al-Faisal accuses Iran of meddling in Yemen and rebuffs Iran's calls to end bombing campaign there, escalating feud between nations and dampening hopes for end to conflict in Yemen.

byline.contributor: Mohammed Ali Kalfood contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen.

lead_paragraph: The foreign minister, Prince Saud al-Faisal, accused Tehran of meddling, as a feud between two regional powers intensified.

headline.main: Saudi Spurns Call by Iran to Draw Back From Yemen
headline.print_headline: Saudi Spurns Call by Iran to Draw Back From Yemen
